modName: Vampiric Grip out of Vampire Lord form
summary: This Mod makes a separate spell \"Vampiric Grip\" to the game that can be cast outside vampire lord form. you dont have to be a vampire lord
descriptionHtml:
This Mod makes a separate spell \"Vampiric Grip\" to the game that can be cast outside vampire lord form. you can find the tome inside riverwood trader

For some reason, this mod makes you able to grab children and dragon bones, i dont know if it works on mammoths and real dragons but it works on miraak  :D

bugs*
-player screams out of pain while casting

changelog* ver 1.9.1
-added a 0 cost version for all you non mages out there :D

notes*
-in god mode, you can still grab people but the drain effect wont do anything(god mode makes removes the lifedrain effect) if you turn off godmode, the drain effect comes back on

-makes you able to grip mammoths and stagger immune units/you cant fling them in the air, you just hold them in place(ragdoll mode) please note that they can still attack you.
author: LoganLee311

files.name: Vampiric Grip 0 cost
files.changelogHtml: Version that has no magicka cost
